summary.para: Obtains the bitmap and mask for the bitmap item.

param.name: bmWidth
param.para: Contains the width, in pixels, of the bitmap item.

param.name: bmHeight
param.para: Contains the height, in pixels, of the bitmap item.

param.name: phbmp
param.para: Pointer to an HBITMAP value that receives the handle of the bitmap drawn for the bitmap item.

param.name: phbmpMask
param.para: Pointer to an HBITMAP value that receives the handle of the mask bitmap. This is a monochrome bitmap that functions as a mask for phbmp. Each black pixel in this bitmap will cause the corresponding pixel in phbmp to be displayed in its normal color. Every white pixel in this bitmap will cause the cooresponding pixel in phbmp to be displayed in the inverse of its normal color.
To display the bitmap without any color conversion, create a monochrome bitmap the same size as phbmp and set each pixel to black (RGB(0, 0, 0)).

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: Obtains the preferred size, in pixels, of the bitmap.

param.name: pszDefault
param.para: Pointer to a SIZE structure that contains the default size, in pixels, of the bitmap.

param.name: psz
param.para: Pointer to a SIZE structure that receives the preferred size, in pixels, of the bitmap. The cy member of this structure is ignored.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

param.name: click
param.para: Contains one of the values that indicate which mouse button was used to click the bitmap.

param.name: pt
param.para: Pointer to a POINT structure that contains the position of the mouse cursor, in screen coordinates, at the time of the click event.

param.name: prcArea
param.para: Pointer to a structure that contains the bounding rectangle, in screen coordinates, of the bitmap.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfLangBarItemBitmap interface is implemented by an application or text service and used by the language bar manager to obtain information specific to a bitmap item on the language bar.
The language bar manager obtains an instance of this interface by calling QueryInterface on the passed to with IID_ITfLangBarItemBitmap.

remarks.para: A language bar bitmap functions as a static item on the language bar that displays a bitmap.
